ns2:test-suite.name: my.company.ScreenshotTest
ns2:test-suite.title: Search tests
ns2:test-suite.description: This testsuite has tests what always are passing

failure.message: AssertionError: Text on current page should be correct Expected: element text is "Yandex" but: <[[PhantomJSDriver: phantomjs on MAC (42b0bc50-d522-11e3-b0be-2db9617b3db9)] -> css selector: title]> text is ""
